item.description:
Hi,

Have you been up to Wedeln yet? If not, want to come check us out locally. Well on Wednesday March 10, you can meet and greet us along with the other EICSL clubs that will be in attendance.

John Harvard's in Framingham is located in the Shopper's World plaza on route 30. There is ample parking. Come share some apps and grab a pint of their delicious beer. We will be there from 6 - 9.

See you there!
Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: I will have some Wedeln gear on.
item.name: John Harvard's Framingham - Meet the Wedelns and other EICSL Clubs
